00042 class SignalHandler

00049     static SignalHandler *d_instance;
00050 
00051     // Table of pointers to instances of EventHandlers. Since EventHandler is

00055     static EventHandler *d_signal_handlers[NSIG];

00057     // Entry point adapter installed into sigaction(). This must be static
00058     // method (or a regular C-function) to conform to sigaction's interface.
00059     // this is part of SignalHandler that uses the Adapter pattern.
